title: VOTE: Who should Manchester United sign in January transfer window?
description: Manchester United might be looking to bolster their squad in January, but who should they sign?
content: Jose Mourinho's side are challenging for the Premier League title and also have a Champions League last-16 tie against Sevilla to look forward to.But will they make any big moves this month?Our interactive tool allows you to share your views on the latest transfer talk. The players below have all been linked with Manchester United in the mainstream media recently, but would YOU like to see the rumours become a reality?Swipe right if you would like to see the player join Manchester United. Swipe left if you would not (app users need to hold down the image before swiping or use the vote buttons below).Spanish outlet Diario Gol claim United are interested in Real Madrid's Gareth Bale, while the Daily Star have reported a potential move for Atletico Madrid's Antoine Griezmann, who came close to joining last summer.The Sun have linked United with moves for former defender Jonny Evans and Tottenham's Danny Rose, as well as Paris Saint-Germain's Lucas Moura and Bordeaux's Malcom.The Daily Record report that Celtic's Kieran Tierney and Fulham's Ryan Sessegnon are both on the club's transfer shortlist, while the Manchester Evening News have said United have been monitoring Arsenal's Mesut Ozil, who is out of contract next summer. Reports in Italy claim Juventus defender Daniele Rugani is also a potential target.The Mirror reported on Saturday that United were ready to rival Real Madrid in their attempts of securing Harry Kane, while The Daily Star on Sunday claimed United have joined the Â£30m battle for Shakhtar Donetsk's Brazil star Fred.Head here to follow all the latest transfer news with our dedicated Transfer Centre blog.
